This game is very good i suck but its fine

Played the first iteration of  the game since 1.6. This is probably the only tactical shooter that stuck with me throughout the year. Unlike R6 or COD, which have too many gadgets and abilities, CS is simple and tactical. It really gives you the feeling of a FPS game since the dawn of time. 

Despite a few "cheaters" and a terribly priced market for skins (mainly due to hoarders), I will still hang out with my friends in this game for a very longer while.
